籤詩版本二:
Ngifuna ukuheha i-Immortal Gui ukuthi ingene eSigodlweni Sexoxo, kodwa ngizovula isango lasezulwini ngikukhulule.
Ngokuphazima kweso, izindaba zimnandi, wonke umuntu uhleka izimbali esiqongweni sentaba
詩意:
Le hexagram iphethe uphawu lwe-osmanthus engafi.
Kumele kube nabantu abahloniphekile kukho konke.
解曰: Izithakazelo zabathengisi. Kukhona (akukho) ingozi ekuyigqokeni. Ukugula kwaqedwa futhi icala lalungiswa. Yenza noma yini ongayenza.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Yiba nomusa futhi ucabangele
UGao Huaide (926-982), igama elihlonishwayo uZangyong, wazalelwa eChangshan, eZhending (manje eyiZhengding, Hebei).
Ngesikhathi se-"Chenqiao Mutiny", ngenxa yokuthi uGao Huaide weseka uZhao Kuangyin njengombusi, wakhushulelwa esikhundleni sokuba yiphini lomhloli omkhulu phambi kwesigodlo.
UGao Huaide naye washada nodadewabo kaSong Taizu uZhao Kuangyin (uZhao Kuangyin wayenodadewabo ababili, oyedwa washona esemncane futhi wabizwa ngokuthi uPrincess Chen; omunye wayeshade noMiford, kodwa ngeshwa umyeni wakhe washona futhi manje wayesengumfelokazi, ngakho uZhao Kuangyin wamqamba ngokuthi inkosazana endala kaYan). Isihloko esisemthethweni bekunguPrince Consort Duwei.
(Njengoba uyiqhawe elisungula futhi ushada nodadewabo wombusi, asikho isidingo sokukhathazeka ngokungabi nesikhundla esisemthethweni.)
聖意: Umuzi awukho esimeni esihle, uyinhlanhla kumuntu, uyinhlanhla kuwena, ulungile ebhizinisini, uyisithiyo somshado, uyinhlanhla kwabahamba ngezinyawo, uyingozi ensimini. imibungu, ayilungele imfuyo eyisithupha, ayifuni ukuthola abantu, kunzima ukuthola abantu, kuyicala, kubi, kuyinhlanhla yokufuduka, kuyinhlanhla, inhlanhla, yinhlanhla, yisifo, yintaba futhi iyinhlanhla.
